verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Where the Spirit of the Lord is,
There is freedom.
Where the Spirit of the Lord is,
There is freedom.
Lift your eyes to heaven;
There is freedom.
Lift your eyes to heaven;
There is freedom.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Freedom reigns in this place;
Showers of mercy and grace
Falling on every face.
There is freedom.
Jesus reigns in this place;
Showers of mercy and grace
Falling on every face.
There is freedom.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If you're tired or thirsty,
There is freedom.
If you're tired or thirsty,
There is freedom.
Give your all to Jesus;
There is freedom.
Give your all to Jesus;
There is freedom.
